metadata.human_readable: Prior elicitation. Language production priors on randomized batches of the data. Unconstrained framing.

pages:
Welcome to this experiment. This experiment should take a total of 30 minutes.

You will be compensated at a base rate of $15/hour for a total of $7.50, which you will receive as long as you complete the study.

We take your compensation and time seriously! The main experimenter's email for this experiment is cogtoolslab.requester@gmail.com.

Please write this down now, and email us with your Prolific ID and the subject line Compensation for language experiment if you have problems submitting this task, or if it takes much more time than expected.
After a brief familiarization phase, you will be labeling a total of 25 images during the experiment. Click next to begin the experiment.

experiment_trial_parameters.label_prompt: How would you create this image?
